techmeme.title: Zimperium: a massive SMS stealer campaign has targeted Android devices worldwide using Telegram bots to infect devices in 113 countries since February 2022 (Bill Toulas/BleepingComputer)
Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian says the CrowdStrike outage will cost the company $500M, after canceling 6,000+ flights, and Delta will seek damages (Financial Times)
Sony signs a deal to be the NFL's official tech and headphones partner, with a new headset in 2025; the NFL also plans to expand the use of Sony's Hawk-Eye tech (Randall Williams/Bloomberg)
Google rolls out new features to make removing explicit deepfakes from Search at scale easier and to prevent them from appearing high up in results (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Spotify plans to expand the availability of lyrics for Spotify Free users in the "coming weeks"; paid subscribers could access unlimited lyrics since May 2024 (Billy Steele/Engadget)
